TopicTitle: Infomation- Broken Panels float in the air, not affected by gravity

Articles.Content:
KSP version 1.0.5 (not affected by mods)

- - - Updated - - -

Another Test concluded the same results:

Good find, I am observing the same. An almost identical bug was observed during Experimental testing months ago and solved, somehow this came back and wasn't spotted earlier this time. Going to make a report, hopefully will be taken care.
